attributes.additional_details:
“If the bee disappeared off the face of the earth, man would only have 4 years left to live”

24% of Europe’s bees are threatened with extinction this is an issue that needs to be talked about.
attributes.background:
Due to habitat loss, climate change and over use of pesticides the worlds bee population is decreasing massively; with over 1/3 of the UKs bee population having decreased in the last decade.
Please sign this petition to get this message spread.
This is an issue desperately in need of a solution.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about bees, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

Alternatively, you may wish to sign one of the following petitions already on this issue:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/244199
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259233
